Mapula Nomvula "Nomi" Kgoale (a mụrụ n'abali iri abụo nke ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1995) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ South Africa nke na-agbara ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị South Africa bọọlụ dị ka onye nchekwa maka onyinye goolu.
Kgoale gara Lindsey Wilson College, Tyler Junior College na Louisiana Tech University, ha abụọ bucha na United States.
Kgoale nọchitere anya South Africa na 2010 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup
O gbara ọgbụgba bọọlụ mbụ ya N'abalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2019 na mmeri enyi na enyi emeriri ha nke ọkpụ atọ ha na asataghị  otu na United States.
